dct_description_sm: Inset map showing a zoomed out map of Smyrna within the Mediterranean region. Meerbusen von Smyrna 1:150,000.
At lower left corner: Brockhaus' Konversations - Lexikon. 14. Aufl.
At lower right corner: F.A. Brockhaus' Geogr.- artist. Anstalt, Leipzig.
Shows roads, railroads, and important buildings.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
